commit.message:
Rollup merge of #108856 - Zeegomo:remove-drop-and-rep, r=tmiasko

Remove DropAndReplace terminator

#107844 made DropAndReplace unused, let's remove it completely from the codebase.

verification.payload:
tree 20c3c538ac48c2022fe209ade2a18662e34cf0f9
parent 2428083558a3c9ab1483c299080a4b784a187b6e
parent 153bfa06e5b8ff57ac5d9274c174c8230a7399eb
author Matthias Krüger <matthias.krueger@famsik.de> 1678307211 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1678307211 +0100

Rollup merge of #108856 - Zeegomo:remove-drop-and-rep, r=tmiasko

Remove DropAndReplace terminator

#107844 made DropAndReplace unused, let's remove it completely from the codebase.

files.patch:
@@ -265,7 +265,6 @@ pub fn terminator_kind_name(term: &Terminator<'_>) -> &'static str {
         Return => "Return",
         Unreachable => "Unreachable",
         Drop { .. } => "Drop",
-        DropAndReplace { .. } => "DropAndReplace",
         Call { .. } => "Call",
         Assert { .. } => "Assert",
         Yield { .. } => "Yield",

@@ -822,7 +822,6 @@ pub(super) fn term_type(kind: &TerminatorKind<'_>) -> &'static str {
         TerminatorKind::Return => "Return",
         TerminatorKind::Unreachable => "Unreachable",
         TerminatorKind::Drop { .. } => "Drop",
-        TerminatorKind::DropAndReplace { .. } => "DropAndReplace",
         TerminatorKind::Call { .. } => "Call",
         TerminatorKind::Assert { .. } => "Assert",
         TerminatorKind::Yield { .. } => "Yield",

@@ -299,10 +299,6 @@ fn check_terminator<'tcx>(
         | TerminatorKind::Unreachable => Ok(()),
 
         TerminatorKind::Drop { place, .. } => check_place(tcx, *place, span, body),
-        TerminatorKind::DropAndReplace { place, value, .. } => {
-            check_place(tcx, *place, span, body)?;
-            check_operand(tcx, value, span, body)
-        },
 
         TerminatorKind::SwitchInt { discr, targets: _ } => check_operand(tcx, discr, span, body),
